caption.p: Different types of transmission rate modifiers π( t) and the quarantine rate ϕ( t): (A–C) step functions with π 0=( π 01, π 02, π 03, π 04) equal to (1,1,1,1), (1,0.9,0.8,0.5) and (1,0.9,0.5,0.1) at change points (23 January, 4 February and 8 February). (D–F) Exponential functions under difference microquarantine measures over time with λ 0=0.01, λ 0=0.05 and λ 0=0.1. (G–I) Multi‐point instantaneous quarantine rates with ϕ 0=(0,0,0,0), ϕ 0=(0.1,0.4,0.3) and ϕ 0=(0,0.9,0) at change points of (23 January, 4 February and 8 February). [Colour figure can be viewed at wileyonlinelibrary.com]
